name: Far Signal (DEMO)
description: Far Signal This game was made for #MyFirstGameJam on 2017. The idea came up when we started to realize how phones affects our society these days. We already have a full develop story. If we get enough feedback, we'll make a full version. Thanks for everyone who plays our little game. We love you and we want to be friends with you. Follow us on Twitter: @Laaud_ | @B3CODED | @brocorpinfo_
